titles.title: E ba wa yin Oluwa Alleluya!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E ba wa yin Oluwa
Alleluya!
Eni ba m’ore Jesu
Ko ba wa gbega (2ce)
Eni ba mo ‘re Re
Ko ba wa gbega ( 2ce)
E ba wa yin Oluwa
Alleluya!
Eni ba mo ‘re Jesu
ko ba wa gbega

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Eni t’ O f’ orun sile to wa
S’ aye
Lati ku fun ese araye
Gbogbo
E korin Alleluya s’Oba
Mimo
Eni ba m’ ore Jesu
K’ o ba wa gbega

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Eni T’ O npa wa mo o
Lojojumo
Eni t’ O nyo wa ninu ewu
Gbogbo
Eni t’ Onpa Israeli mo
K’ itogbe
Eni ba m’ ore Jesu
K’ o ba wa gbega

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Eni t’ O npese fun aini wa
L’ aye
Eni t’ O nsore fun wa l’ ojo
Gbogbo
Ore t’ O nse fun wa ko
L’ onka rara
Eni ba m’ ore Jesu
K’oba wa gbega

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
E ni to npa wa mo o lojojumo
Eni t'o nyo wa ninu ewu gbogbo
Eni t'onpa israeli mo k'itogbe
Eni ba m' ore Jesu
K' o ba wa gbega
